title: An Introduction to visual illusions (TEFC)
creator_credit: John Caldwell, Stanley Halls and Caldwell-Halls Productions
brief_description: Professor Joseph Lyons explains the functions of the eye and the brain in perception, how the brain collates information about distance, perspective and movement. A variety of ingenious film techniques are used to illustrate visual illusions.
